sentences:
André Obey (; 8 May 1892 at Douai , France – 11 April 1975 at Montsoreau , near the Loire River ) was a prominent French playwright during the inter - war years , and into the 1950s .
He began as a novelist and produced an autobiographical novel about his adolescence le Joueur de triangle ( The Triangle Player ) .
After his meeting with Jacques Copeau , he devoted himself completely to dramatic works .
In 1945 Obey became provisional general administrator of the Comédie - Française .
He was made full general administrator in 1946 , and resigned in 1947 after just under a year 's service .
Obey 's play Le Viol de Lucrèce was drawn on by Ronald Duncan for the libretto of Benjamin Britten 's opera The Rape of Lucretia .
Obey served as general administrator of the Comédie - Française , in a provisional capacity from October 1945 until 6 April 1946 , then with full powers until his resignation on 5 February 1947 .
